data.title: Little People, BIG DREAMS
data.meta_description: Meet Michael Jordan, one of the greatest all-time basketball players. Little Michael wanted to be the first at everything – especially if that meant beating his older brother. One day, he came home crying… he’d been rejected from the basketball team at school. With his mom’s message of “go out and earn it” ringing in... Read more »
data.text:

Illustrated by Martin Le Lapin
